answers.answer: anemia, diabetes, epilepsy?there are many things that it could be. is there a reason your parent(s) haven't taken you in to the doctor about this?try paying attention to what you have or haven't eaten when this happens. i used to have dizzy spells when i was younger and sometimes would black out. i have always been anemic (do you bruise easily/lasts a long time and overly tired all the time) and when my blood was running low on oxygen or when i hadn't had a whole lot of (healthy) sugars, i would get dizzy. make sure you have a healthy diet

question: Hi im 13 and for some reason,A couple times a day i feel really lightheaded , dizzy and then i collasp to the groundit started 3 years ago and i would just feel light headedand then it was maybe once a month?then it was once a week with collasping and nowits a couple times a day.What could possibly be the problem ? ... help!
title: Collapsing?
